column1: John McCain has stated that the oil-for-food scandal and perennial failure to uphold Human Rights has demonstrated a "crying need for reform" in the UN.

column1: Baldwin would withdraw the US from the United Nations, perceiving it to be a threat to American sovereignty.
column2: Barr calls the United Nations "an enormous disappointment" and asserts that "[t]he U.S. should push to roll back the UN’s functions and slash America’s financial contribution".
